thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: Jeannie Kraus
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Jeannie Kraus

author: Jeannie Kraus
title: Jeannie Kraus
text: A business you can trust to purchase the best and most suitable Optics for your needs. Their lifetime warranty on EO and Vortex products is worth the peace of mind in repairs and cleaning. I have purchased 2 sets of binoculars and a spotting scope. Their website offers detailed information, reviews and videos about their products. They are helpful on the phone with further questions about making your purchase.
